__e: Leverages his sole knowledge of the chest's location to gain control of the men.
We'd like to know where that chest is now.
And it is what lay inside the chest you seek, don't it?
You can't take your sea chest, missus.
Shouldn't you be in your coffin? The sun's out right now.
He said he was sure you were dead. He saw your coffin loaded on that plane that you came back on.
